channel.title: CiTR -- Synaptic Sandwich
channel.description: : Every show is full of electro bleeps, retrowave, computer generated, synthetically manipulated aural rhythms. If you like everything from electro / techno / trance / 8bit music / and retro '80s this is the show for you! There is also a segment dedicated to the latest in the innovative, interresting and wierd world of technology and science.
channel.itunes:summary: : Every show is full of electro bleeps, retrowave, computer generated, synthetically manipulated aural rhythms. If you like everything from electro / techno / trance / 8bit music / and retro '80s this is the show for you! There is also a segment dedicated to the latest in the innovative, interresting and wierd world of technology and science.

item.description: The Sandwich goes retro with the help of special guest Dave Toddington of Soundproof fame. This show relives the eighties scene of Vancouver through the eyes and ears of one of it's most forefront local TV hosts of one of the most prolific music video shows - Soundproof .This is one amazing show so if you missed it live this is the podcast for you.
